1.content:
It's another sunny day in your average suburban neighborhood. It's around 9:30 AM, and most of the residents are just getting up to begin their morning routines. Tim, an average young man in his mid twenties steps out onto the front porch of his home dressed in a blue robe with a cup of coffee in one hand, fetching the morning paper and the mail as he does every day. As he bends over to pick up the newspaper at the edge of the property, he hears a high pitched whistle coming from his left. He looks over to see the head of his neighbor, Katie the Kitsune, peeking over her side of the white wooden fence, a half mischievous half flirtatious smirk on her face.

It's only at this point Tim realizes she had whistled because she got a view of his backside when he bent over. He quickly stands back up, a slight blush in his face. Katie just giggles. "Don't be so embarrassed, Tim. I think your butt is very cute." Tim sighed. Katie would often flirt with him like this, and he would always acknowledge her remarks but never returned her interest. It was nothing personal, he just wasn't interested in dating outside his own species.

"Um, thanks, I guess." He replied. Katie giggled again, batting her eyes and blowing him a kiss before going back inside. Though Tim wasn't romantically interested in Katie, he couldn't help but watch as she made her way back to her house, her hips and nine luxurious tails swaying side to side as she did so. Even he had to admit she was quite attractive. He still wasn't sure why she hit on him , though. He was nothing special and he knew it, and with a body like her's she could have any guy she wanted. I should really ask her why she's so interested in me sometime, he thought as he made his way back into the house.

Tim shares his home with two housemates, with whom he splits the rent. There was Tony, a large and muscular werewolf who worked at the local gym as a fitness instructor. Tim and Tony didn't exactly call each other friends, but they got along well enough. Then there was Tina, a ghost who technically was a tenant in the house before the other two, having died shortly after moving in about a year before Tony and Tim. She wouldn't say how she died, but whatever happened she didn't seem to let it bring her down. Tina was quite cheerful and optimistic, almost nothing seemed to dampen her mood. Her housemates aren't exactly sure what she does for a job, but as long as she helps pay her share of the rent, they don't really care.

Tim sat on the living room sofa to read the newspaper, joined shortly after by Tony. "Anything interesting in there?" Tony asked, only half interested as he switched on the TV. "Same old stuff." Replied Tim. Tina suddenly rises up from beneath the sofa on the other side of Tim, having just been down in the basement of the house a second before. "So guys, anything happening today?" She asked, to which Tim and Tony both shrugged and grunted in response. Tina huffed and crossed her arms as she gave a little pout "You guys are always either working or just sitting around. Come on, it's the weekend! Let's go out and do something for once!"

(Please note, this first chapter was just to set up the main cast and get the first episode rolling. The first episode of the first season will begin right where this leaves off. Each season will have a total of 12 to 15 episodes. Depending on how well this does, I may add additional seasons. For now, let's focus on the first. Please do not worry about any future seasons for the time being, and if you have an idea for an episode, put it in the current season list. Thank you.)
1.title: Pilot

11.content:
Pilot (Continued): Spurred by Tina, the group decides to go out to a movie together, just for something to do. While there, Tim happens to run into an old high school sweetheart of his whom he hasn't seen for years. He invites her back to his home to hang out, but who should appear on the doorstep but Katie. Turns out Katie is kind of the jealous type, and tries to concoct a plan to get rid of Tim's old flame, so she can have him all to herself.

Dating Disaster: Looking to get in on the dating scene, Tony downloads a dating app on his phone to find a potential significant other. But his chosen date raises some concerns with his housemates, as she is a literal soul-sucking succubus. The especially worries Tina, as she is a disembodied soul vulnerable to such a creature. Is Tony's date just looking for love, or is she just after him for his soul?

The Party: Tina is bored, and convinces the guys to invite the neighborhood to a sort of block party. But it turns out Tim really can't handle his liquor, and the next morning he wakes with a hangover and the aftermath of his shenanigans during the party the previous night.

Reunion: Tina's still living family pays a surprise visit, to try and convince her to move on to the next life. But Tina is reluctant to do so, afraid of where she might end up. Will she be persuaded to pass on? Or does she still have business on Earth?
11.title: Season 1

112.content:
Tony sighed, He was so tired, it has been a long day. Most of time he loves his job. He helps people, to become stronger, healthier, better. As much as he enjoys helping people they can be so difficult sometimes, which leads to him get extremely angry. Tony exhaled when he entered his car. He placed his key into the ignition and drove off. Tony was so glad that he bought this sports car, he smiled as he felt the wind in his fur. He sometimes just drives to feel the wind in his fur. He doesn’t know why he enjoys it so much, he just enjoys the feeling of euphoria going through his fur. Tony brought his attention to the road, knowing that this isn’t time or place to be day dreaming. He almost caught up in the Canine phenome. The canine phenome was a study several years about how canine lycanthropes and how their statically more likely to be caught in a crash. It was first thought that the statistics were just coincidently, but after this study it was found out it had to with an old instinct passed down through generations. Because of this It became extremely hard for lycanthropes to get drivers licenses. It was extremely troublesome.
 
         Tony pushed those thoughts away, and continued to drive. He drove through gazing around the small town, and the rows of new building that were build by mythical Incorporated. He was looking forward to trying the new restaurants, especially McDaris, not to be confused with McDevils the…. club. Tony drove passed the restaurants, and drove into his neighbor. Waving hello to some of neighbors before driving into the garage. He got out of his car, and headed into the house. He then sat down on the couch, and starting to scroll through his feed. He suddenly stopped scrolling, as he stopped on a photo of Hannah, a hot Lycan that he used to date. She was hot in her wolf form , as well as in her human form. He sighed, he sure does miss her, and seeing her with a new boyfriend several weeks after they broke up made him start fuming. He took deep breath in and calmed himself. He was glad he took those anger management classes, it really helped.
 
         “I guess she already moved on, so it’s time for me to as well.”

         He pulled up a dating app called Cinder, that he downloaded one night when mopping around after their break up. He opened up the app and quickly created a quick profile, and created it. He was surprised when it matched him someone almost instantly. His match with an attractive dark skinned human named Raina(Ximena) she was wearing a cute hoody covering her head , she had a nice smile. He clicked on her profile and started reading her self-summary. Tony discovered that she was lived near him, so using his “manly” charms he convinced her for him to take her out for a date tomorrow. Tony satisfied put away his phone and headed to bed. Tony said goodnight to his housemates, and walked over to the bathroom to brush his teeth. As he looked into the mirror, he forgot he forgot he stayed lycanthrope form that he has been in for 3 three weeks straight. “That’s not good” he thought as he transformed back into human form, he saw all of brown fur retreat back into his skin, and his fangs retreating back into his teeth. His yellow eyes diming back to his regular greens. As he got acquainted with his human form, he has to stop doing that. It is dangerous for Lychantropes to stay in their wolf forms. It can awake the inner animal within then making them rapid. It sadly happened to his uncle.
 
         “Rest in Piece uncle Benny” he said underneath his breath.
 
         He knows that he shouldn’t relax in his wolf form, but it just seemed more natural. He took a quick shower that he hadn’t had in days, and instead of wiping it off with a towel , he instinctively shook it off. He sighed as he went clean up the mess, he then brushed his teeth and went to sleep.
 
         He woke up in a good mood the next day and decided to hang out with some friends today before he was going to go on the date. He walked out into their backyard, a took in the morning air. He walked back in just in time for the toast to pop out of the toaster. He quickly put it on his plate with his eggs, ham, and bacon. He quickly devoured his food. He heard a yawn as Tim walked into the room,
 
         “Good morning.” Tony said as Tim sleepily walked over the coffee make and made a coffee.
 
         “Good morning Tony. Did you have good night sleep.” Tim yawned
 
         “I did.”
 
         Tim wiped his eye and looked up at Tony again.” Woah, you’re in your human form this morning. I haven’t seen you like this for a while.”
 
         “Yeah, I actually forgot I have been in my Lycan form for a while.” Tony chuckled
 
“I don’t know how you can forget that but to be fair I am not a Werewolf.” Tim chuckled back
 
“What are you guys chuckling about?” Tina said as she floated up from the basement.
 
“Good morning Tina.” Tim and Tony said in unison which both of them repeated “jinx!”, and “jinx again!”
 
         Tina rolled her eyes, but quickly changed her tune when Tony said that he is going out.
 
         “Tony, please take me with you, I am so bored!”
 
         Tony declined her plead several more times before leaving and heading to ___.
 
Where will Tony go to meet his friends?
112.title: Dating Disaster

1121.content:
Tony drove to a popular diner in the town called “Tom’s Diner”. He entered the diner and was waved over by John. John also an Lycan and they have been friends since high school, sitting next to john was Tyler a cyclops who introduced him to his job. He sat right next to a childhood friend Remington an Tengu. Tony and his friends ordered then procced to talk about how each other have been. John works as a mechanic in shop two towns over, and Remington owns a little sushi place downtown. Tyler is a architect now working for the company Sky high. Tony was happy to see everyone was doing so well.
 
“Hey tony, you still at that job, I introduced you to?” Tyler asked
         “Yeah.”
 
         “You still working on that novel of yours?” Remington asked
 
         “Yeah its coming on along well. I’m currently working on a story about a Samurai that gets sent to future by shapeshifting demon of darkness.”
 
“That sounds boring, no one would read that” John said after a pause
 
         Tony chuckled” Even if it was interesting to you. You couldn’t read it has to many big words.”
 
         “Hey!” John responded angrily, followed by Remington’s and Tyler’s laughter.” I..... know big words, like… never mind.”
 
         After talking joking around for a while, the topic changed to their love lifes. John and Tyler have been getting laid a lot. While Remington has been in a solid relationship with another Tengu. When the conservation come around to him, he explained to them he had a date tonight with a hot dark-skinned human name Raina. They congratulated him, after talking a while more he left, went to before for the date. As he went home, he thought about what to wear. It all depends on what type of restaurant they’re going to.
 
         Where is he going on his date?
1121.title: A Diner

11212.content:
He decided to wear a nice suit to this place, luckily the owner owes him a favor so he gets to eat their free. He drives over their early, and enters the place. Jeez this place is fancy He thought to himself. The entire restaurant had a romantic atmosphere, candelabra hanging from the ceiling with a romantic music playing around him. Their was a artificially made foundation leading to a coy pond. As he is being seated he looked at the table with two forks, two spoons and fancily folded napkin. When he saw he realized he has no clue what each fork is meant to be used for, that's when he heard a voice.
 
         “Hello, are you Tony?”
 
         He turned to the voice and his heart pounded by how beautiful she is. She had brown skin with freckles around her noise, and she had green eyes. She was wearing a dress that went down to her feet. Tony stood up and pulled out her seat.
 
         ” Yes , I am Tony, and you must be Raina.”
 
         She sat down smiling, Tony walked over and sat down, as the waiter came up and took their order. After ordering Tony started the conversation with “How has your day been so far?”
 
         “It has been great thanks for asking! How has yours been?” She said cheerfully
 
“It has gotten way better.” He replied dreamily, he closed his eyes , and kicked himself for saying that out loud. Now Raina is looking at him strangely.
 
         “Sorry, I just haven’t been in the dating scene for a while so I’m kind of rusty. What I said their was pretty cringe” Tony apologized
 
         “Oh, its fine! I’m quite rusty myself, and… yeah that was pretty cringe.”
 
They both laughed.
 
         “So what do you do for work?” She asked
 
         “Well, I work at a gym as a fitness instructor.”
 
         “Oh, that’s cool.” She said awkwardly
 
         “Where do you work?” Tony asked and was met with a long silence, and Raina looking down a her dress sadly.
 
         “Oh, I don’t mean to make you uncomfortable. If you don’t want to talk about its fine.”
 
         “No, Its fine. I just quit abusive job, that have been doing for many years. I have finally escaped that nightmare, and I.. just can’t”
 
         Tony placed his hand on Raina’s ” Its fine if you don’t want to talk about it now, but when your ready I will be here to listen.”
 
         She smiled “ Thank you.”

After finishing their meals, Tony and Raina left and were walking to their respective cars.
 
         “I had great night.” Raina said
 
         “I did too.”
 
         Raina brought out a notepad scribbled her number on it, and gave it to him. Raina turned around to leave , but then stopped.
 
“Wait a minute.” She said playfully “I forgot to give you something.”
 
She walked toward him, and gave him a __?
11212.title: A fancy place

choices: At Mall to check out the Dave and Busters.
112121.content:
Raina came up and kissed Tony on his lips. The way she kissed her velvety lips wrapping around his, was the best kissed he was ever given. Raina blushed, and walked away quickly. Tony stood their eyes widen still processing the godly kiss he was given. He stood for a while, then snapped out of it and drove home with a chipper mood. He then went home, and collapsed in bed. He woke up in the morning still with chipper mood from last night. He just laid in bed for a little before getting up to the smell of bacon and eggs. He got up and went to the kitchen to see Tim cooking his famous Sunday breakfast. Tim is really good at cooking; he is a god at cooking. Tony sat down as Tim placed some food on his plate. Tony consumed the meal, while Tim placed some food on his plate. Tony rubbed his belly full from the godly meal he just ate.
 
         “Thank you, for the great meal, Tim.”
 
         “No, prob.”
 
         “So, your in a chipper mood today Tony.”
 
         “Yeah, I guess I am.”
 
         “ I haven’t seen you this happy , since you got the highest score on wolfman(this worlds equivalent of Pacman)” Tim responded
 
”You got so angry when, I passed your score.” Tony laughed
 
         “Of course, I did! I worked so hard for that score, then you just came up wiped my score out of existence!”
 
         They both chuckled for a little bit, then they both left to go to meet with own friends. Tony drove to meet Remington. Tony was excited to see Remington’s Sushi place. Tony drove up to a building with architecture similar to what you would except in Japan. Tony saw Remington closing up shop, and walking up to his car. As he entered the car it immediate starting running and driving away.
 
         “So, Remington. How was the reopening of your sushi place?”
 
         “It was pretty stressful, but we are used to stress, aren’t we?
 
         “Yeah, we are.” Tony said with a nostalgic lens It was a lot simpler back then.”
 
         “Can’t say I miss it though. “
 
         “Yeah, me neither, but sometimes I miss just be able to brawl it all out in my wolf form.” Tony clutched his fist.
 
         Remington stared at him, looking as he wants to say something, but he also missed the freedom that it brought. Tony and Remington lived in a ghost pretty much and had to fight to survive since a young age. Even thought it wasn’t a very nice place to live it was all they have known. It was definitely different from how they live know, they their street was teared down and the cops started crack down on violence in the era, they became more peaceful, but also more restricted. They arrived at____.
 
         Where do they arrive at?
112121.title: She gave him a Kiss

info.brief_description: The first of it's kind, an interactive supernatural sitcom! GP rewards for good adds!
info.description:
Okay, so here's the rundown. As with most of my stories, this takes place in a world where humans and mythical creatures coexist. The three main characters, a human, a werewolf and a ghost are all housemates living in a suburban neighborhood somewhere in the US. The series follows their daily misadventures as they try to go about their lives, making ends meet and getting into various hijinks along the way.

So here's how this works. Select a "Season" and then an "Episode"', then follow that episode's primary plot as described. At certain points you'll be given the chance to decide what happens next. Understand?

Now, some groundrules...

1. No killing the main characters
2. No short chapters, unless you're just giving more choices for episodes
3. If you're going to end an episode, let it reach a minimum of 7 to 10 chapters in length first
4. Feel free to come up with your own ideas for future episodes. All are welcome! Just please make sure your idea hasn't already been listed
5. I may edit or add rules as I feel is necessary.

If your additions are really good, I may give up to 10,000 GP per add, depending on their quality. That's all for now, enjoy!

By the way, if anyone can think of a better title for this story, please let me know! I'll be sure to credit you for it.
